content: this legal text summarizes a case involving two parties mr pc fa and spouses ld pl regarding the division of assets specifically the case revolves around two warehouse basement floors in castelfidardo italy the parties have agreed to end their coownership and divide the assets into two shares mr pc fa will receive one warehouse basement floor while the spouses ld pl will receive the other each share is valued at euro 10000 the case has been resolved and the parties have agreed to the division of assets
